title: Gemini Model Configurability
description: Allow users to choose between Gemini models (2.5-flash, 2.5-pro, etc.) based on their needs and quota.

title: Trim Recording UI
description:
Add UI to trim recordings.
Proposed solution:
- Waveform visualization in recording view
- Drag handles to select trim points
- Silence detection to suggest cut points
- 'Trim' button to truncate audio files and update duration

title: Auto-Stop Recording
description: Detect extended silence and prompt user to stop recording, or auto-stop after configurable threshold.

title: Audio Channel Flip / Set as Me
description:
Add 'Set as Me' option in speaker menu to designate which speaker is actually the user.
Proposed solution:
- Update the is_me flag for styling
- Persist the choice to database
- Re-render transcript with correct alignment

title: File Search Duplicate Prevention
description:
Re-transcribing a meeting uploads a new file to Gemini File Search without removing the old one.
Proposed solution:
- Check if file deletion API is now available
- If not, track file IDs and implement cleanup
- Or use content deduplication on query side
